author: Joseph Young
title: China Alters Death Count After Skepticism Surrounds Coronavirus Numbers
description:
Wuhan announced the addition of 1,290 coronavirus deaths in China. It comes after the general public's skepticism towards official numbers.
The post China Alters Death Count After Skepticism Surrounds Coronavirus Numbers appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The authorities in Wuhan added 1,290 deaths, bringing the number of total coronavirus deaths in China to 4,632.
  • China now has three coronavirus deaths per 1 million people, compared to 105, 413, 367, and 275 in the U.S., Spain, Italy, and Fran… [+3335 chars]
